title: Rethinking Ranked Fives and Tuning Dynamic Queue

replies.body:
GJ guys I think dynamic queue is slow slowly starting to come together. I think what the community wants to see now, are improvements to matchmaking quality, and a bit more solo queue player recognition.

Maybe we could get the emblems on the loading screen?

i was thinking the same thing! put the emblem in loading screen. Theres far too many people out there who could not climb by themselves so they duo with others to get to gold+, and it kinda ruins the feeling of accomplishing gold tier all by your own, when the guy next to you got the same rank by duoing with everyone he thinks is good =/
hey riot im unranked and in my ranking games im vsing diamonds and golds WHY id rather wait for a few minutes longer than get in that sort of game and get demolished{{item:3070}}

Yo, the placement games matter far more about which games you win than the overall win/loss ratio. If you win a game vs. a heap of diamonds, then lose 9 against bronze, you'll likely still do well in placements... Gl!
Good option bringing back rank team!

You know what'd help? Unranked draft. I'm so sick of having half a game, and I don't feel like I can play ranked because I can't practice for ranked without feeling like I'm going to be punished for it. Blind pick is a horrible representation of what the game should be. We need unranked draft.

the quality of the games in low plat are horrible. dynamic queue has allowed people to queue up with there mates and climb out of the elo they should be in and then when they solo they dont have there mates to carry them and its ruining league. something needs to be done about when people are not with there 5 man premades there mmr should be adjusted cause its really getting annoying have players 0/10 in ur games after 15 mins

I play mostly queue as solo but I think that having emblems is unfair for players who actually want to play with their friends. Any other emblem apart from the solo queue one basically says that your boosted by your friends and not good enough to climb on your own. This could be the case sometimes but for those who just play with their friends it's very demoralising.
How is it unfair, if they queue with friends they are tagged with "Queues as a group", which is simply the truth. If those players don't want to be labeled as a dynamic player, play solo.
But if they just want to play with their friends how is it fair that they are labelled as boosted animals?

So this doesn't actually help the solo players ranked experience in the slightest.there needs to be something in place that effectively stops solo players being placed against 5 mans in lower elo. you do all these reports for high elo, but what about the lower player with little to no comms in game in bronze going up against most people on comms? This emblem isn't going to do crap to actually hepl the problem with dynamic queue. and ti sure as hell wont make me feel better if i see the other team has the "five man" emblem. It will just dishearten me.
When are we going to see this?
Ranked emblems are **currently** scheduled for 6.13

Ok it's good to see you taking some initiative, it makes me want to quit the game slightly less. But how is my emblem going to stop me from getting rolled by 5 man pre-mades? Especially the ones getting carried by smurfs and boosters.
so riot is basically telling me that i cant play supp any more if i want to rank up thank you riot i didn't even play in a 3 just my duo bot lane {{item:3070}}
How does this information stop you from climbing as a support?

To be honest, the removal of team 5v5 was one of the more stupid moves this season.
Just because you aren't sure what the results may be, doesn't mean you shouldn't test.
It should have been left running to see how it would be affected, before making any decisions.

All I want for autofill is to be able to exclude a roll. 
I'm trying to improve but feel like I'm letting down the team when I land on adc.

Is this likely to be a feature in the future?
I'm in gold and my mate and I duo queue (he's same rank) and we get 15 minute queue times when ranked together but on our own we get 10 minutes so under 5 minute queue for gold is kinda bull.
This is cool and all... But how do I achieve the Fire Emblem?

so if riot makes the decision to bring back ranked 5s but only during peak hours, will oce be getting it as well, as far as i knew that was already how it worked for oce and even on the best of days the que time for 5v5s was just as bad as team builder (not that that was specifically a bad thing though)

We will be assessing if we can get ranked 5's again in OCE as well.
If we turn it on, we want to ensure healthy matchmaking and queue times so there is a likely chance it will available for fewer hours in OCE than in some of the larger regions.

I got queue times that were 21 minutes and 17 minutes, 1 game after the other, and I was duo with at least 4 roles taken for both games. Really hope this gets fixed, because I don't remember the last time I got a queue time below 7 minutes. I'm Silver 5 btw
Bravo, bravo! Good work with the emblems, which do nothing at all. I call this Riot spitting in the face of the players. Once Overwatch ranked comes in, goodbye  League of Legends.

> [{quoted}](name=Kiryuuin Satsuki,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=yhgHnHB4,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-06-19T10:15:23.710+0000)
>
> Bravo, bravo! Good work with the emblems, which do nothing at all. I call this Riot spitting in the face of the players. Once Overwatch ranked comes in, goodbye  League of Legends.

Just to reiterate, Riot's aware this isn't the fix-all solution and is looking into other solutions as well. 
>With solo queue gone, there needs to be better recognition of individual achievement. We're committed to solving this problem, and we think this implementation of ranked emblems probably won't completely solve this issue for the players who are least happy with dynamic queue. We're seeing emblems as one step towards a better system, not as the end-all-be-all solution to the problem. We want to see how this is received before we move on to other options (and we are looking at other options).

I would be more happy with Riot just telling everyone they are working on something and keep at it. Adding emblems is not even a step towards a solution let alone anything meaningful. It is simply a vanity item that contributes nothing towards the problem.

I Just want to know where you guys are getting your direction from?? cause your product (league of legends) is made for a customer base (the players) And when that customer base is leaving in droves and people including the people who play it for a living are saying the direction it is going is very poor, instead of going aww yeah we messed up this didn't work your just making it worse and trying to fix it with little gimmics (ranked emblems, auto fill etc.) WHY doesnt rito just face up to its mistake and fix it by either coming up with a better different system or going back to solo q it makes no sense........
Oml Dynamic Q ruining League, goals

I main sup. Around the time dynamic que was introduced, I got to Silver 3, and was feeling really comfortable abut Gold in the near future. A few weeks into dynamic que and I dropped 3 divisions. It may not matter so much above Plat, but in the Bronze, Silver and Gold realms, a lot of players are getting punished for poor development choices. Check out my match history. I have played almost solely Aram for the last month, because ranked has become too frustrating.

The emblem addition is a vanity item, and contributes nothing significant to the game. The last year has seen you slowly but surely head down the path of World of Warcraft, in terms of gameplay, development and customer relations. Just admit you f**ked up and bring back soloq

gg
Oh my those solo emblems are gonna be super useful when we get matched up against 3-4 man premades. ty so much riot for helping me out in my ranked games :D

So instead of fixing a system that only 5% of the population like, you're gonna just give us these super meaningful emblems that are so 'hard to obtain'.

Okay then...
